sentences.en: " Oh, Ashley, I'm getting old and decrepit. "
sentences.cn: " 哎, 艾希礼, 我很快就老了,要老掉牙了.

sentences.en: A new car came into operation in 1987 - the old one was becoming frighteningly rusty and decrepit.
sentences.cn: 新缆车在1987年的时候开始使用了,所以,老式缆车看上去脏兮兮的,破旧得让人感到有些不放心.

sentences.en: Bill rode past the street on a horse that decrepit and about to collapse.
sentences.cn: 比尔骑着一匹马经街道而过,那马衰弱得很,简直随时会趴下走不动.

sentences.en: Bill rode past the street on a horse that looked decrepit and about to collapse.
sentences.cn: 比尔骑着一匹劣马走过街道,那马摇摇晃晃地简直随时会趴下来.

sentences.en: Cinemas were old and decrepit , productions were clunkers and pirated videotapes and discs proliferated.
sentences.cn: 影院老旧不堪,制作陈旧, 盗版横行.

sentences.en: Conclusion: Extract of Polygonum multiflorum Thunb. ( PmT ) have effect of decrepit obviously.
sentences.cn: 结论: 何首乌提取物具有明显的抗衰延寿作用.

sentences.en: Hanging from the walls, propped on benches, resting in their decrepit boxes, are nearly 2,000 dead.
sentences.cn: 挂在墙上 、 靠在长板凳上 、 躺在破旧棺木里的, 是将近2000个死者.

sentences.en: He was a rather decrepit old man.
He was dragging out his remaining years in decrepit health.
The back yard was a m é lange of decrepit teak furnishings, lumpy grass and a beat - looking umbrella.
sentences.cn: 后院是混杂的破旧柚木家具, 几块草地和一把拍动状的伞.

sentences.en: The British music scene is nostalgic, decrepit and moribund.
sentences.cn: 英国音乐呈现出感伤怀旧、暮气沉沉、行将就木的景象。

sentences.en: The buildings were in a decrepit state.
The film had been shot in a decrepit old police station.
sentences.cn: 该影片是在一所破旧不堪的警察局里拍摄的。

sentences.en: The infrastructure, from hotels to transport, is old and decrepit.
sentences.cn: 从宾馆到交通，所有的基础设施都已陈旧失修。

sentences.en: Then her heart sank. The decrepit animal would never pull the hill.
sentences.cn: 可随即她的心又往下沉 ---- 这匹跛脚老马怎么爬得上去呀!

trans.tran_cn: 衰老的，老朽的，破旧的，头童齿豁，衰朽，蓬头历齿
